name: DARES AVIATION, S.L.
about: At DARES AVIATION, S.L., we are committed to providing high-quality, comprehensive aviation training tailored to the unique needs of each student. As an authorized training organization, we offer modular and integrated courses for private, commercial, and airline transport pilot licenses. Our training programs are designed to ensure maximum flexibility, with options for classroom, blended, and online instruction. We utilize advanced training simulators and optimal training aircraft to ensure students gain over 200 hours of real flight time. Our focus is on academic excellence, transparency, and ongoing student support to prepare future pilots for the demands of the aviation industry. We prioritize the well-being and success of our students, ensuring they are well-prepared for their careers as professional pilots.
